Uses of Interface
com.artemis.EntityObserver

  • Packages that use EntityObserver 
    Package Description
    com.artemis
    Core Artemis classes.
    com.artemis.managers
    Manager implementations.
    com.artemis.systems
    Entity systems.

    • Uses of EntityObserver in com.artemis

      Classes in com.artemis that implement EntityObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ComponentManager
      Handles the association between entities and their components.
      class  EntityManager
      EntityManager.
      class  EntitySystem
      The most raw entity system.
      class  Manager
      A manager for handling entities in the world.

    • Uses of EntityObserver in com.artemis.managers

      Classes in com.artemis.managers that implement EntityObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GroupManager
      If you need to group your entities together, e.g tanks going into "units" group or explosions into "effects", then use this manager.
      class  PlayerManager
      You may sometimes want to specify to which player an entity belongs to.
      class  TagManager
      If you need to tag any entity, use this.
      class  TeamManager
      Use this class together with PlayerManager.

    • Uses of EntityObserver in com.artemis.systems

      Classes in com.artemis.systems that implement EntityObserver 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DelayedEntityProcessingSystem
      The purpose of this class is to allow systems to execute at varying intervals.
      class  EntityProcessingSystem
      A typical entity system.
      class  IntervalEntityProcessingSystem
      If you need to process entities at a certain interval then use this.
      class  IntervalEntitySystem
      A system that processes entities at a interval in milliseconds.
      class  VoidEntitySystem
      This system has an empty aspect so it processes no entities, but it still gets invoked.
